name: Invasion of the Mutant Potatoes
description:
After a growth experiment goes wrong, the mutant potatoes are on the loose.
Catch them before they are out of control in this fun and challenging game.

This is my first project since 23 years of leaving programming.

Download it, play it, have fun.

Note:  this is not a farming simulation.  These are not real potatoes.

GAMEPLAY
Tap movement - simple to start but challenging to master
Conserve your energy by minimizing movement and regain it by getting those spuds
Watch out - those spuds can get mighty quick!

FEATURES
Fun 8-bit graphics
Catchy 8-bit music - yes it will get in your head!
